metadata.name: House Of Petals # 1
metadata.description: As a House of Petals Badge holder, you will get access to an evolving WORLDwide in real life experiences of the whimsical Rock’N garden and the legendary Rock’N roll speak easy that Eddie Van Halen was so fond of. Holders will have continued added value through partner project mints and our HOP metaverse launch, which holders will be able to mint for the price of gas alone (in most instances).
